name: Throw N Grow
description:
Welcome to Throw N Grow! Throw the watermelon into the net to earn scores!
What's that? The watermelon fell and exploded? That's ok! A small slice will be launched up the air, and it's up to you to pick it up and put it into the pot, where it will grow into another, big, beautiful watermelon

The more you score, the harder it gets!
